column5: Located 1.5 miles from downtown, 2 miles from the Blanco River, Blue Hole and Cypress Creek and 4 miles from Jacobs Well. Fantastic Wimberley Valley views, we are close to shops, water areas and restaurants. We do accept Single nights, just ask !  Long Term for a single guest or quiet couple Completely furnished, includes all , WiFi and fresh sheets, towels for the duration of your stay. Dedicated free parking space is included! 1st, Last & D
